verses.verse: Now it came to pass in the thirtieth <S%H7970><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> month, in the fifth <S%H2568><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, as I was among <S%H8432><s%> the captives <S%H1473><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> of Chebar <S%H3529><s%>, that the heavens <S%H8064><s%> were opened <S%H6605><s%>, and I saw <S%H7200><s%> visions <S%H4759><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>. captives: Heb. captivity
In the fifth <S%H2568><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, which was the fifth <S%H2549><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Jehoiachin's <S%H3112><s%> captivity <S%H1546><s%>,

The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came expressly unto Ezekiel <S%H3168><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Buzi <S%H941><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar <S%H3529><s%>; and the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was there upon him. Ezekiel: Heb. Jehezkel

And I looked <S%H7200><s%>, and, behold, a whirlwind <S%H7307><s%> <S%H5591><s%> came <S%H935><s%> out of the north <S%H6828><s%>, a great <S%H1419><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and a fire <S%H784><s%> infolding <S%H3947><s%> itself, and a brightness <S%H5051><s%> was about <S%H5439><s%> it, and out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof as the colour <S%H5869><s%> of amber <S%H2830><s%>, out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>. infolding: Heb. catching itself

Also out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof came the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of four <S%H702><s%> living creatures <S%H2416><s%>. And this was their appearance <S%H4758><s%>; they <S%H2007><s%> had the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>.
And every one <S%H259><s%> had four <S%H702><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%>, and every one <S%H259><s%> had four <S%H702><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%>.

And their feet <S%H7272><s%> were straight <S%H3477><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%>; and the sole <S%H3709><s%> of their feet <S%H7272><s%> was like the sole <S%H3709><s%> of a calf's <S%H5695><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%>: and they sparkled <S%H5340><s%> like the colour <S%H5869><s%> of burnished <S%H7044><s%> brass <S%H5178><s%>. straight: Heb. a straight foot

And they had the hands <S%H3027><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> under their wings <S%H3671><s%> on their four <S%H702><s%> sides <S%H7253><s%>; and they four <S%H702><s%> had their faces <S%H6440><s%> and their wings <S%H3671><s%>.

Their wings <S%H3671><s%> were joined <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H802><s%> to another <S%H269><s%>; they turned <S%H5437><s%> not when they went <S%H3212><s%>; they went <S%H3212><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> straight <S%H5676><s%> forward <S%H6440><s%>.

As for the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of their faces <S%H6440><s%>, they four <S%H702><s%> had the face <S%H6440><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>, and the face <S%H6440><s%> of a lion <S%H738><s%>, on the right side <S%H3225><s%>: and they four <S%H702><s%> had the face <S%H6440><s%> of an ox <S%H7794><s%> on the left side <S%H8040><s%>; they four <S%H702><s%> also had the face <S%H6440><s%> of an eagle <S%H5404><s%>.

Thus were their faces <S%H6440><s%>: and their wings <S%H3671><s%> were stretched <S%H6504><s%> upward <S%H4605><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> wings of every one <S%H376><s%> were joined <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H376><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> their bodies <S%H1472><s%>. stretched: or, divided above

And they went <S%H3212><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> straight <S%H5676><s%> forward <S%H6440><s%>: whither the spirit <S%H7307><s%> was to go <S%H3212><s%>, they went <S%H3212><s%>; and they turned <S%H5437><s%> not when they went <S%H3212><s%>.

As for the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of the living creatures <S%H2416><s%>, their appearance <S%H4758><s%> was like burning <S%H1197><s%> coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>, and like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of lamps <S%H3940><s%>: it went up and down <S%H1980><s%> among the living creatures <S%H2416><s%>; and the fire <S%H784><s%> was bright <S%H5051><s%>, and out of the fire <S%H784><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> lightning <S%H1300><s%>.
And the living creatures <S%H2416><s%> ran <S%H7519><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a flash of lightning <S%H965><s%>.

Now as I beheld <S%H7200><s%> the living creatures <S%H2416><s%>, behold one <S%H259><s%> wheel <S%H212><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the living creatures <S%H2416><s%>, with his four <S%H702><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%>.

The appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the wheels <S%H212><s%> and their work <S%H4639><s%> was like unto the colour <S%H5869><s%> of a beryl <S%H8658><s%>: and they four <S%H702><s%> had one <S%H259><s%> likeness <S%H1823><s%>: and their appearance <S%H4758><s%> and their work <S%H4639><s%> was as it were a wheel <S%H212><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of a wheel <S%H212><s%>.
When they went <S%H3212><s%>, they went <S%H3212><s%> upon their four <S%H702><s%> sides <S%H7253><s%>: and they turned <S%H5437><s%> not when they went <S%H3212><s%>.

As for their rings <S%H1354><s%>, they were so high <S%H1363><s%> that they were dreadful <S%H3374><s%>; and their rings <S%H1354><s%> were full <S%H4392><s%> of eyes <S%H5869><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> them four <S%H702><s%>. and their rings: or, and their strakes

And when the living creatures <S%H2416><s%> went <S%H3212><s%>, the wheels <S%H212><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> by them <S%H681><s%>: and when the living creatures <S%H2416><s%> were lifted up <S%H5375><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>, the wheels <S%H212><s%> were lifted up <S%H5375><s%>.

Whithersoever the spirit <S%H7307><s%> was to go <S%H3212><s%>, they went <S%H3212><s%>, thither was their spirit <S%H7307><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%>; and the wheels <S%H212><s%> were lifted up <S%H5375><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> them: for the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the living creature <S%H2416><s%> was in the wheels <S%H212><s%>. of: or, of life

When those went <S%H3212><s%>, these went <S%H3212><s%>; and when those stood <S%H5975><s%>, these stood <S%H5975><s%>; and when those were lifted up <S%H5375><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>, the wheels <S%H212><s%> were lifted up <S%H5375><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> them: for the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the living creature <S%H2416><s%> was in the wheels <S%H212><s%>. of: or, of life

And the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of the firmament <S%H7549><s%> upon the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the living creature <S%H2416><s%> was as the colour <S%H5869><s%> of the terrible <S%H3372><s%> crystal <S%H7140><s%>, stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> over their heads <S%H7218><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>.

And under the firmament <S%H7549><s%> were their wings <S%H3671><s%> straight <S%H3477><s%>, the one <S%H802><s%> toward the other <S%H269><s%>: every one <S%H376><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%>, which covered <S%H3680><s%> on this side <S%H2007><s%>, and every one <S%H376><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%>, which covered <S%H3680><s%> on that side <S%H2007><s%>, their bodies <S%H1472><s%>.

And when they went <S%H3212><s%>, I heard <S%H8085><s%> the noise <S%H6963><s%> of their wings <S%H3671><s%>, like the noise <S%H6963><s%> of great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, as the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>, the voice <S%H6963><s%> of speech <S%H1999><s%>, as the noise <S%H6963><s%> of an host <S%H4264><s%>: when they stood <S%H5975><s%>, they let down <S%H7503><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%>.
And there was a voice <S%H6963><s%> from the firmament <S%H7549><s%> that was over their heads <S%H7218><s%>, when they stood <S%H5975><s%>, and had let down <S%H7503><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%>.

And above <S%H4605><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%> that was over their heads <S%H7218><s%> was the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of a throne <S%H3678><s%>, as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a sapphire <S%H5601><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>: and upon the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of the throne <S%H3678><s%> was the likeness <S%H1823><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> upon it.

And I saw <S%H7200><s%> as the colour <S%H5869><s%> of amber <S%H2830><s%>, as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> within <S%H1004><s%> it, from the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of his loins <S%H4975><s%> even upward <S%H4605><s%>, and from the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of his loins <S%H4975><s%> even downward <S%H4295><s%>, I saw <S%H7200><s%> as it were the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>, and it had brightness <S%H5051><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

As the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the bow <S%H7198><s%> that is in the cloud <S%H6051><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of rain <S%H1653><s%>, so was the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the brightness <S%H5051><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>. This was the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. And when I saw <S%H7200><s%> it, I fell <S%H5307><s%> upon my face <S%H6440><s%>, and I heard <S%H8085><s%> a voice <S%H6963><s%> of one that spake <S%H1696><s%>.
